articles.description: Keanu Reeves looked dapper as he arrived to the 2022 MOCA Gala held at The Geffen Contemporary at MOCA in Los Angeles on Saturday night.
articles.content:
Keanu Reeves looked dapper as he arrived to the 2022 MOCA Gala held at The Geffen Contemporary at MOCA in Los Angeles on Saturday night.
